title: Le Charme Discret de la Bourgeoisie = the discreet charm of the bourgeoisie
description: Three 'bourgeois' who have built their fortune on drug trafficking attempt to get together to celebrate a successful transaction, but only there are complications waiting at every turn. Bunuel applies his surrealist touch to a mundane event: a dinner party that may never come to pass. The initial problem seems to be a simple scheduling mistake, but the obstacles become more and more bizarre. At one point, the guests are interrupted at the table by an army on manoeuvres. Awards: Academy Award for Best Foreign Film 1972  Credits: Producer, Serge Silberman ; director, Luis Bunuel ; writer, Luis Bunuel, Jean-Claude Carriere ; photography, Edmond Richard. Cast: Fernando Rey, Paul Frankeur, Delphine Seyrig, Bulle Ogier, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Stephane Audran, Claude Pieplu, Michel Piccoli, Muni, Pierre Maguelon, Francois Maistre.
